Demirören Tech.Inc.

  • Notifications: Used real time notification with firebase.
  • News Management: Published and managed according to the approval mechanism of the news. Developed state-machine which is can manageable on database for this approval mechanism.
  • RSS Feed: Produced dynamically RSS for news.
  • File Uploads: MinIO Stroage, FFmpeg and RabbitMQ with Python backends for a web application used by reporters for uploading multiple photos with different sizes or videos.
  • Workflow: Preparing detail design documents as per business and functional requirements. Also, involving with the logical/physical data modeling design, ER diagram, process flow modeling.
  • Rest API: Developing, design and implementation of the new API endpoints as a part of high-volume to communicate with third-party application.
  • Testing: Performing unit & load testing that using pytest and factory boy for Rest API's, Models, Views and Admins. Resolved technical problems relating to the business-critical customers- facing portal resulting in system performance and scalability improvements.
  • Package: Developing new features and customization of the django admin for the high-profile progressive web application. We need list-filter with autocomplete. Then, we released the package that is named django-admin- autocomplete-list-filter.

Biges Inc.

  • Automation: I built a Slack bot that automates the process of notifying members of tasks assigned to them in a group or team.
  • Dev Environment: Analytics environment based on docker and AWS, standardized the python and dependencies.
  • Workflow: Preparing detail design documents as per business and functional requirements. Also, involving with the logical/physical data modeling design, ER diagram, process flow modeling.
  • Rest API: Developing, design and implementation of the new API endpoints as a part of high-volume to communicate with third-party application.
  • Testing: Performing unit & load testing that using pytest and factory boy for Rest API's, Models, Views and Admins. Resolved technical problems relating to the business-critical customers- facing portal resulting in system performance and scalability improvements.
  • Canias Library: Wrote a library for e-commerce platform(B2B) working in an integrated with canias erp application.
  • Developed maintained the software solutions to receive, normalize, process and distribute real-time market data to the platform.
  • Developed data APIs to allow consumption of this data by clients and third parties, and ensuring all related systems are operating reliably and efficiently.
  • Provided on-call support for client queries and market-related events, worked with other internal teams (including Systems Infrastructure and QA) to ensure timely development and delivery of projects.

Pyksys Tech.

  • Created reporting & analysis support, microsites and web applications for pharma and life sciences companies in their digital endeavours.
